alert.note: Alert for Collingsworth (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 02 at 5:08PM CDT by NWS Amarillo
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of Collingsworth County through 545 PM CDT... At 507 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 5 miles south of Lutie, or 6 miles north of Wellington, moving north at 25 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Wellington, Dodson, Dozier, Lutie, Quail and Samnorwood. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 800 PM CDT for the Panhandle of Texas.
